CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1973, pg. 18 reads: "Burn Parsonage Mortgage - The Right Rev. E.P Murchison, second form left was the officiating Bishop when mortgage burning ceremonies took place at Cleaves Temple CME Church recently, liquidation the mortgage on the church property on Zara St. Shartrice Miller in the foreground, represents the church of the future.  Other principals in the picture, reading from left are: Officer English Burton, Rev. Houston Hodges, pastor; Rev. L.W.Burns, presiding elder; Rev. V.C. Maddox and Albert Charley. (Harris Photo)"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: English Burton, Rev. E.P. Murchison, Rev. Houston Hodges, Rev. L.W. Burns, and Rev. V.C. Maddox, standing on altar of Cleaves Temple CME Church for mortgage burning
